short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the price quickly when buying a shirt
short.vi: Tính giá nhanh khi mua áo sơ mi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Band T-Shirts Chrome Extension app! This application helps you easily search and buy t-shirts that match your music passion. With the quick pricing feature, you can estimate prices based on the number of t-shirts you want to buy and explore gift, team, and music t-shirts.

Salient features:

Fast and convenient price calculation: With the quick price calculation feature, you can easily estimate the total cost based on the number of t-shirts you want to buy. Just enter the quantity in the corresponding box, the application will automatically calculate the estimated total price, helping you manage your shopping budget effectively.

Display a variety of t-shirts: The Band T-Shirts app on Chrome Extension displays a list of t-shirts, including gift t-shirts, team t-shirts, and music-related t-shirts. You have the flexibility to choose t-shirts that suit your interests and passions.

Information describing each T-shirt: The application provides detailed information about each T-shirt, including design descriptions, images, and special details. You'll know what you're getting with each t-shirt purchase, helping you choose wisely.

How to install and use:

Setting:

Open Google Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "Band T-Shirts" in the search box.
Select the "Band T-Shirts" widget and press the "Install" button.
Use:

When you browse the web or search for t-shirts, the "Band T-Shirts" app icon appears in your browser toolbar.
Click the icon to open the utility.
To calculate the price of t-shirts, enter the quantity you want to buy in the corresponding box, and the app will display the estimated total price.
In the list of trending t-shirts, you can explore and choose the t-shirt that suits your style.
With the Band T-Shirts app on Chrome Extension, you can express your passion for music through classy fashion. Try it today and make your t-shirt collection even more impressive!
